title: Kafeneio
description: This is a webring for the github organization 'Kafeneio'. It's a part of the Software Technology class in Ionian University, department of Informatics. We are a team of 5 (five) students, aiming to learn as much as possible about Software, Operating Systems, CLI, Github (+Netlify) and hosting and deploying websites through them Keep calm and drink Coffee!.  Προς τα μέλη της ομάδας: Προτού κάνετε pull requests στο main repository του webring πρώτα κάντε ένα fetch για να γίνει συγχρονισμός του repository σας με τις αλλαγές!
